transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji madam boliye.
Customer: Haan ji madam. Ho gaya aapka login ho gaya sir madam isme?
Customer: Haan login ho gaya hai.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Madam leads mein aap ek baar usme kya kehte IndiaMART ke app mein aa rahe ho open kar rahe ho ki usme seller panel se open kar rahi hai Chrome pe?
Customer: Ek minute.

Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji madam boliye.
Customer: Ji madam aapne kis mein open kiya hai? Seller panel se open kiya hai ki IndiaMART ke app mein madam?
Customer: Madam aapne jo link diya tha na us link mein open kiya hai.
Executive: Haan theek hai, theek hai. Seller panel se open kiya. Madam jaise ki yahan se jab aap buyleads section mein aayengi na.
Customer: Ek minute.

Customer: Madam isko app kaun sa download karna hai?
Executive: App install mein Play Store mein IndiaMART ka jo app aata hai na.
Customer: Madam isme do tarah ke app bata raha hai. Ek to IndiaMART hai aur ek IndiaMART app hai. To mein kaun sa download karu?
Executive: Ek second mein aapko screenshot bhej rahi hu aapko.
Customer: Ek to red wala hai aur ek blue wala hai. Wo IndiaMART bata raha hai.
Executive: Red wala. Red, red wala madam, red wala.
Customer: Red wala hai na?
Executive: Haan.

Customer: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Haan ji iske alawa aapka jo KYC hona tha wo ho gaya sir?
Customer: Sir complete ho gaya mera. Haan sir aapka IndiaMART mein complete ho gaya.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Yahan par hume sell ke liye lena hai na?
Executive: Bilkul jaldi start karaiye sir. Hello. Aapke jitne bhi product milenge to aapke liye utna hi achha rahega.
Customer: Haan ye isme puch raha hai I want to to hamara to selling ke liye hai na IndiaMART.
Executive: Madam jaise usme aapne login kiya hai na.
Customer: Haan, haan.
Executive: Number daal ke wo aise hi aata hai likh kar ke madam wo bas aapko login karna hai usme. Abhi aap usme sirf website mein ho na abhi aap to.
Customer: Theek hai, okay, okay, ho gaya.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai. Ab iske baad mein ab buyleads section mein usme kya kehte hai upar dekhiyega three lines bani hongi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Three lines mein click kariye.
Customer: Kiya.
Executive: Theek hai usme latest buyleads hongi. Latest buyleads mein click kariye madam.
Customer: Madam usme latest buyleads usme to nahi aa raha hai. Seller tool aa raha hai madam?
Customer: Red colour ka kuch likh kar ke niche side.
Customer: Nahi aa raha isme.
Executive: Achha buyleads ka kahin option aa raha hai aapko niche ban kar ke?
Customer: Haan, aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek minute. Yahan to post requirement aa raha hai.
Executive: Ek minute. Madam dekhiye jahan pe upar aap dekh rahe honge jahan pe search wala aapka naam likh kar ke aa raha hoga hi karke usme upar mein three lines bani hongi badi badi mein.
Customer: Three lines hai na uske andar dekhiye uske andar home hai, view all categories hai, post your requirement hai, message hai, my orders hai, your favourite hai, ship with IndiaMART hai, verify it becomes a seller for free hai, feedback hai, help support hai, choose bhasha hai, share app hai, about IndiaMART hai aur setting hai.
Executive: Madam seller tool pe aa raha hai aapke paas kuch?
Customer: Jis seller free aa raha hai become a seller free.
Executive: Ek baar usme click kariye madam.
Customer: Yahan par to ye puch raha hai business name.

Executive: Haan madam aisa usme aap rehne do usme aa jao link mein aa jao rehne do madam. Mein aapko screenshot bhejti hu kaise kya karna hai tab aap kariyega theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, okay. Theek hai madam link wale pe aap open kar lo.
Customer: Okay. Link open karne ke baad aap buyleads wale section pe aaiye left hand side mein dekhiyega buyleads ka ek option dikh raha hoga aapko.
Customer: Haan buyleads ka dikh raha hai.
Executive: Haan usme click kariye madam.
Customer: Kiya usko click.
Executive: Aapko pehle dikh raha hoga.
Customer: Pehle leads dekhiyega ki aapke product se related hai na?
Customer: Ek minute madam.
Executive: Aapke paas unka call aayega usme aapko confirm kar dena yes sir theek hai.


Customer: Madam iske andar India ko search karna hai.
Executive: Nahi, nahi madam India pe.
Executive: Search nahi karna madam aapko kuch nahi karna. Aap jab page open kiye honge na to aapko leads dikh rahi hongi.
Customer: Kya madam?
Executive: Mein ye bol rahi hu jab aapne page open kiya ho.
Customer: Page open kiya hoga to aapko leads dikh rahi hongi madam.
Customer: Nahi dikh rahi hai madam leads nahi dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Buyleads mein aapne click kiya hai?
Customer: Haan buyleads par hi kiya hai.
Customer: Haan maine kiya hai dekhiye buyleads pe gaye isme aaya options latest buyleads. To latest buyleads pe kiya hai. Haan abhi isme aayi hai leads. Haan aap phone se open kar rahe ho kya madam?
Customer: Haan madam phone par kar rahi hu mein. To latest buyleads pe click kariye.
Customer: Latest buyleads par hi kiya tha maine. Ab isme aaya hai account manager perfect number service.
Customer: Isme to plan khula hai madam.
Executive: Madam aap isme app mein mat open kariye mein aapko kya keh rahi hu Google Chrome mein daal ke seller.indiamart.com pe login kariye.
Customer: Madam usi mein kar rahi hu mein.
Executive: Madam usme latest buyleads usme madam kahan latest buyleads aati hai?
Customer: Madam screen share kare kya?
Executive: Kariye madam kariye mein aapko batati hu. Mujhe sahi aapko bhej rahi hu.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance with accessing buyleads.

- Customer is unsure which app to download.

- Customer is unable to find the buyleads section.



Resolution:

- Executive provided guidance on accessing buyleads.

- Executive provided guidance on downloading the app.

- Executive shared a screenshot to guide the customer.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send a screenshot for guidance.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, app, login, seller panel
